about.title: About the Author
about.paragraph_1: Hello! I'm Fredy R., a brazilian passionate web developer, focused in backend, new web technologies and a bunch of other stuff. I created this blog to share my thoughts on technology, programming, and life in general.
about.paragraph_2: With over 5 years of experience in the tech industry, I've worked on various projects and have gained insights that I'm excited to share with you through this blog.
about.paragraph_3: When I'm not writing or coding, you can find me exploring nature, reading literature, playing some instrument (mainly bass or acoustic guitar), or experimenting with new recipes in the kitchen.
about.paragraph_4: Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or just want to connect. I'm always happy to chat about technology, writing, or any other interesting topics!

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.message: We're currently working on improving our contact form to serve you better.
contact.alternativeContact: Please check back soon or reach out to us via email at
